Our philosophy and mission

Our aim is to become a structurally stable and growth oriented organization, with sustainability at it's core. Our excellence in what we do should be directed towards healing and the betterment of the society.

We strive to provide our customers with best quality products while bringing reliable health solution for the users.

Visit our manufacturing unit
History

We started our operations in 1990s, under the skilled leadership of Mr. Sanjay Kumar in Delhi, India, as Capital Orthopaedic. We were one of the first manufaturers for Orthopedic implants and medical devices in India.

Since then, we have grown in numbers and have made an everlasting mark in the industry. We redefined our operations under the brand name of Oriens Medical.

We deal in more than 24 countries and have capabilities to provide customized products for our clients' needs.
